Question
========
What is the average grade for the Introduction to Philosophy exam (variable: introduction_philosophy) for the students who received a score lower than 6.0 on the Knowledge Theory exam (variable: Knowledge Theory) and who had a score of 1 on Theorem 2 (variable: Theorem2)? Write your answer in the answer box (with 4 decimal places).

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-246-nl-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-246-nl-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 3.7882.
